Class BonjourBrowserMultiServiceListener

java.lang.Object
BonjourBrowserMultiServiceListener
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.apple.dnssd.BaseListener, com.apple.dnssd.BrowseListener, com.apple.dnssd.DomainListener
public class BonjourBrowserMultiServiceListener extends Object implements com.apple.dnssd.BrowseListener, com.apple.dnssd.DomainListener
Class for implementation of a listener for general service advertisements. Discovers service types available on the network using the meta-query. Also enumerates browse domains to support unicast DNS-SD.

  • Constructor Details

    • BonjourBrowserMultiServiceListener

      public BonjourBrowserMultiServiceListener(BonjourBrowserInterface browser) throws com.apple.dnssd.DNSSDException
      Constructs a new BonjourBrowserMultiServiceListener. Implements a listener for general service advertisements.
      Parameters:
      browser - BonjourBrowserInterface instance of the browser (must not be null)
      Throws:
      com.apple.dnssd.DNSSDException - if browsing fails to start
      NullPointerException - if browser is null

  • Method Details

    • isRunning

      public boolean isRunning()
      Checks if the browser is currently running.
      Returns:
      true if browsing is active

      Specified by:
      domainFound in interface com.apple.dnssd.DomainListener
      Parameters:

      flags - operation flags
      ifIndex - interface index
      domain - the discovered domain (e.g., "local." or "example.com.")

      public void serviceFound(com.apple.dnssd.DNSSDService browser, int flags, int ifIndex, String serviceName, String regType, String domain)

      flags - flags for use
      ifIndex - interface index
      serviceName - the service type name (e.g., "_http")
